original_text: They must not eat some birds because they are not clean. They must not eat either the eagle or the vulture.
korean_text: 새 중에 너희가 가증히 여길 것은 이것이라 이것들이 가증한즉 먹지 말지니 곧 독수리와 솔개와 물수리와

sentences.original_text: They must not eat some birds
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 어떤 새들을 먹으면서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: They must not eat either the eagle
